video.title: Beyond Scared Straight!
video.synopsis: Troubled teens get a dose of prison life by interacting with hardened inmates who try to intervene before the wayward kids land in jail themselves.

episodes.synopsis: The realities of life behind bars prompt a group of troubled girls to re-think their actions -- and the pain they've put their mothers through.
episodes.title: Oneida, NY

episodes.synopsis: At a regional jail in Virginia, four inmates from opposite sides of the track discover they have a common trait: a thirst for trouble.
episodes.title: Western Tidewater Regional Jail, VA: Big and Bad

episodes.synopsis: When his 12-year-old sister suffers an emotional breakdown, a 14-year-old inmate is so hardened that he refuses to offer her comfort.
episodes.title: Lake County, FL

episodes.synopsis: Four teens locked up near Michigan's infamous Eight Mile learn that the pain they've caused their families doesn't end once they're behind bars.
episodes.title: Oakland County, MI

episodes.synopsis: Two troubled teenage sisters see the depth of the pain they've caused when their mother has an emotional breakdown.
episodes.title: Douglas County, GA

episodes.synopsis: Four teens think their tough street reputations will protect them from other inmates until one finds himself targeted by gang members.
episodes.title: Hampton Roads, VA: Girls Fight Back

episodes.synopsis: A troubled 12-year-old who lied to the police gets a much-needed dose of reality behind bars, where even a broken arm can't slow him down.
episodes.title: Richland County, SC: Truth or Consequences

episodes.synopsis: Deputy Lyle is back to influence the lives of four wayward teens, including a drug dealer and a boy who threatened to stab his pregnant mother.
episodes.title: Floyd County Jail, GA: Deputy Lyle Returns

episodes.synopsis: A beautiful cheerleader's ex-convict mother is concerned that her daughter will follow in her footsteps. Meanwhile, tempers flair over chest hair.
episodes.title: St. Clair County, IL

episodes.synopsis: A gang member is cut off from his younger brother, while a stoner tries to defend his girlfriend's honor against a cellblock full of snarling inmates.
episodes.title: Albuquerque, NM: Dance, Bieber, Dance

episodes.synopsis: A violent teen featured in a previous episode is now a submissive inmate hoping to change the lives of a new group of teenagers.
episodes.title: Floyd County, GA:  Snitches Get Stitches

episodes.synopsis: Fifteen-year-old fighter Steven becomes enraged and tries to run from officers to escape the harsh realities of jail.
episodes.title: Oklahoma County, OK:  Insane and Chaos

episodes.synopsis: In Maryland, troubled teens visit a jail, a funeral home and an emergency room, leading to a deadly encounter.
episodes.title: Queen Anne's County, MD: Outside and Inside

episodes.synopsis: Four teens are shown the "alternative lifestyle" unit to impress upon them that being different makes you an even bigger target in jail.
episodes.title: Fulton County, GA

episodes.synopsis: A teenage football player wants to join the SWAT team after graduation, but drugs and fighting are leading him straight to "the longest yard."
episodes.title: Charlotte County, FL

episodes.synopsis: A troubled teen disappears into a crush of angry inmates as deputies and his loyal, street-tough brother try to find him.
episodes.title: St. Clair, IL

episodes.synopsis: A fighter and thief taunts deputies, a boy boasts he hit another boy in the face with a brick, and a young serial shoplifter is reduced to cowering.
episodes.title: Dougherty County, GA
